column1: echo ¦echo¦"en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8" >> /etc/locale.gen && locale-gen en_US.utf8 && /usr/sbin/update-locale LANG=en_US.UTF-8 :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦for¦dir in $RDIR $RCOVDIR; do echo "R_LIBS_SITE=\\${R_LIBS_SITE-'/usr/local/lib/R/site-library'}" > $dir/lib/R/etc/Renviron.site; echo 'options(repos = list(CRAN = "http://stat.ethz.ch/CRAN/"))' >> $dir/lib/R/etc/Rprofile.site; done :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦'installing patched version' && tar zxf R-$RVERSION.tar.gz && patch -p0 < r302_coverage.patch && cd R-$RVERSION && ./configure --prefix $RCOVDIR --enable-R-shlib --enable-memory-profiling --with-readline && make -j 4 && make install :: Filesystem_operation

echo ¦echo¦'Normal installation' && tar zxf R-$RVERSION.tar.gz && cd R-$RVERSION && ./configure --prefix $RDIR --disable-R-shlib --enable-memory-profiling --with-readline && make -j 4 && make install && cd .. && rm -rf R-$RVERSION :: Filesystem_operation
